channel.description: Recent content in Visual Studio on Quill.Codes

item.title: Don't Fear the // Todo
item.description: Did You Know? Visual Studio tracks your “// TODO” comments so you can find them later. From within Visual Studio Go to View -> Task List. This will display the Task List window and show you any area of your open Solution that has existing comments that start with // TODO. You can filter down to your Current Project, Current Document, or Open Documents. It even will allow you to search the list.
